name: Chased by Darkness
description:
A new inmate brought with him a bestial spirit. Two days after his arrival, there was a mass suicide attempt in the penitentiary, among those involved were prisoners and prison officers. The authorities did not want to believe the victims reports of a supernatural force, but decided to evacuate the penitentiary until everything was cleared up. The prison warden called you, a clairvoyant, to help. Now, you will need to perform a ritual to purify the penitentiary and free it from the presence of Barkannan.

GAMEPLAY

  • Single player mode
Do all the work alone. Use your ability to see and interact physically with spirits. But be careful, any mistake will cost a lot.

  • 2-4 player co-op
Join with other players and work together to stop Barkannan. If an ally get caught, you can rescue him in the prison cells.

  • Finish the ritual
You need to eliminate Obsessors and burn enough soul stones to ban Barkannan to the spiritual plane.

  • Eliminate enemies
Use your gun to eliminate Raptors and slow Barkannan when he is hunting. The ammo is not infinite, so save it for the necessary moments.

DARKNESS IS COMING

  • Escalating difficulty
Barkannan will get faster and more aggressive as the game progresses.

  • Replayability
Obsessors, passwords and keys are randomized spawned, this way each game will be different.

  • Insane mode
If you are looking for a challenge, the Insane mode was made for you. Faster, harder, crazier!

WARNING

This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.
